extendedInfo.description: Mobile Book Builder has been designed to provide agents & agency producers with the ability to grow the agency (currently only Farmers Auto & Life) while outside their office. The MBB app creates a lead, produces a âconversationalâ quote, designed to take the conversation with the lead to the next step. Users of this app are authorized Farmers Agents who have a valid agency dashboard user id and password.Note:* Requires Android 2.2 and later* Not compatible with tablets* OH bar code is encrypted. Drivers License details and address need to be manually entered* IL, MN bar code is partially encrypted. Address needs to be manually enteredWhat's included in this Versionâ¢	Scan the barcode at the back of customerâs driverâs license to generate a quoteâ¢	Generate leadâ¢	Generate auto quoteâ¢	Generate life quoteâ¢	Add/delete vehicles â¢	Add/delete driversâ¢	Option to select from different coverageâ¢	Email quote to customer

reviews.title: Nicely Done
reviews.comment: Already using it.  Helps me get lead\'s info and provide them an Auto pre-quote right there + plus a Life quote. I don\'t need to be in the office to do this. Once I get back to the office I can contact the customer and get them a quote I can bind. Id love to see the app have Home and Umbrella. Thank you Farmers.
reviews.author: David Williams
